bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Radio Interface for White Space Dynamic Spectrum Access Radio Systems Supporting Fixed and Mobile Operation
IEEE Draft Radio Interface for White Space Dynamic Spectrum Access Radio Systems Supporting Fixed and Mobile Operation

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This standard specifies a radio interface including medium access control sublayer and physical layer of white space dynamic spectrum access radio systems supporting fixed and mobile operation in white space frequency bands, while avoiding causing harmful interference to incumbent users in these frequency bands.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
